backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing comic entries with create, list, and fetch-by-id functions stored in an in‑memory Set.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a footer background color update to its related file, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across layout, pages, hooks, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables configuring OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell defining metadata and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theming, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/comics/ComicCard: Comic preview card showing image, metadata, and truncated text with navigation to detail view.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: White‑background footer showing attribution and styled banana‑themed branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky banana‑themed header with logo, navigation, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/comics/useComicEntrie: React Query hook fetching the full list of comic entries from the backend.
React Query hook retrieving a single comic entry by its ID with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/comics/useCreateComic: Mutation hook creating new comic entries and invalidating cached lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context handling login, stored identities, and status management for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styling, Tailwind layers, and a banana-themed color palette with custom shadows and fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseComicsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a searchable, filterable, and sortable list of comic entries with error handling and UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/ComicDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single comic entry with loading, error states, and navigation back to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and calls to action for browsing or submitting comics.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitComicPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting a new comic entry with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom banana-themed colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, a high‑level app summary, and a list of existing feature definitions with IDs, descriptions, synonyms, and versions for the Banana IC web app.
